51827.どこからともなく 声が 聞こえてくる。: From out of nowhere, a voice can be heard.

51829.<center>永き時を経て 異界の地で\n魔瘴のチカラを その身に宿せし魔族が:
<center>Through passage of time in the spirit world, the
Demon Miasma's power was harnessed by the demons and
embodied one who came to be known as 'Demon King'.

51830.<center>魔の王のチカラは 六聖陣をも圧倒し\nついに 聖戦に敗れる時が来:
<center>The Demon King's power overwhelmed even the Six
Saints; finally the time of the Holy War's defeat
had come.

51831.<center>六聖陣は かろうじて 逃げのびたが\nこの敗北は 地上への魔瘴の:
<center>The Six Saints narrowly escaped, but their defeat
allowed the Demon Miasma's invasion of the surface
and was said to have brought forth the end.

51832.<center>もはや 六聖陣と その従者だけでは\nアストルティアを守ることの:
<center>No longer were the Six Saints and their followers
merely protectors that arrived in impossible times.
